info.name: PhoneTrack
info.summary: Track and display phones positions in real time
info.description:
# PhoneTrack Nextcloud application
üì± PhoneTrack is a Nextcloud application to track and store mobile devices locations.
üó∫ It receives information from mobile phones logging apps and displays it dynamically on a map.
üåç Help us to translate this app on [PhoneTrack Crowdin project](https://crowdin.com/project/phonetrack).
‚öí Check out other ways to help in the [contribution guidelines](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
How to use PhoneTrack :
* Create a tracking session. * Give the logging link\* to the mobile devices. Choose the [logging method](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#logging-methods) you prefer. * Watch the session's devices location in real time (or not) in PhoneTrack or share it with public pages.
(\*) Don't forget to set the device name in the link (rather than in the logging app settings). Replace "yourname" with the desired device name. Setting the device name in logging app settings only works with Owntracks, Traccar and OpenGTS.
On PhoneTrack main page, while watching a session, you can :
* üìç Display location history * ‚õõ Filter points * ‚úé Manually edit/add/delete points * ‚úé Edit devices (rename, change color/shape, move to another session) * ‚õ∂ Define geofencing zones for devices * ‚öá Define proximity alerts for device pairs * üñß Share a session to other Nextcloud users or with a public link (read-only) * üîó Generate public share links with optional restrictions (filters, device name, last positions only, geofencing simplification) * üñ´ Import/export a session in GPX format (one file with one track per device or one file per device) * üó† Display sessions statistics * üîí [Reserve a device name](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#device-name-reservation) to make sure only authorized user can log with this name * üóì Toggle session auto export and auto purge (daily/weekly/monthly) * ‚óî Choose what to do when point number quota is reached (block logging or delete oldest point)
Public page and public filtered page work like main page except there is only one session displayed, everything is read-only and there is no need to be logged in.
This app is tested on Nextcloud 17 with Firefox 57+ and Chromium.
This app is compatible with theming colors and accessibility themes !
This app is under development.
## Install
See the [AdminDoc](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/admindoc) for installation details.
Check [CHANGELOG](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#change-log) file to see what's new and what's coming in next release.
Check [AUTHORS](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/AUTHORS.md#authors) file to see complete list of authors.
## Known issues
* PhoneTrack **now works** with Nextcloud group restriction activated. See [admindoc](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/admindoc#issue-with-phonetrack-restricted-to-some-groups-in-nextcloud).
Any feedback will be appreciated.
## Donation
I develop this app during my free time.
* [Donate with Paypal](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=66PALMY8SF5JE) (you don't need a paypal account) * [Donate with Liberapay : ![Donate using Liberapay](https://liberapay.com/assets/widgets/donate.svg)](https://liberapay.com/eneiluj/donate)

* üìç Display location history * ‚õõ Filter points * ‚úé Manually edit/add/delete points * ‚úé Edit devices (rename, change color/shape, move to another session) * ‚õ∂ Define geofencing zones for devices * ‚öá Define proximity alerts for device pairs * üñß Share a session to other Nextcloud users or with a public link (read-only) * üîó Generate public share links with optional restrictions (filters, device name, last positions only, geofencing simplification) * üñ´ Import/export a session in GPX format (one file with one track per device or one file per device) * üó† Display sessions statistics * üîí [Reserve a device name](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#device-name-reservation) to make sure only authorized user can log with this name * üóì Toggle session auto export and auto purge (daily/weekly/monthly) * ‚óî Choose what to do when point number quota is reached (block logging or delete oldest point)
Public page and public filtered page work like main page except there is only one session displayed, everything is read-only and there is no need to be logged in.
This app is tested on Nextcloud 17 with Firefox 57+ and Chromium.
This app is compatible with theming colors and accessibility themes !
This app is under development.
## Install
See the [AdminDoc](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/admindoc) for installation details.
Check [CHANGELOG](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#change-log) file to see what's new and what's coming in next release.
Check [AUTHORS](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/AUTHORS.md#authors) file to see complete list of authors.
## Known issues
* PhoneTrack **now works** with Nextcloud group restriction activated. See [admindoc](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/admindoc#issue-with-phonetrack-restricted-to-some-groups-in-nextcloud).
Any feedback will be appreciated.
## Donation
I develop this app during my free time.
* [Donate with Paypal](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=66PALMY8SF5JE) (you don't need a paypal account) * [Donate with Liberapay : ![Donate using Liberapay](https://liberapay.com/assets/widgets/donate.svg)](https://liberapay.com/eneiluj/donate)

info.description:
# PhoneTrack Nextcloud application
üì± PhoneTrack is a Nextcloud application to track and store mobile devices locations.
üó∫ It receives information from mobile phones logging apps and displays it dynamically on a map.
üåç Help us to translate this app on [PhoneTrack Crowdin project](https://crowdin.com/project/phonetrack).
‚öí Check out other ways to help in the [contribution guidelines](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
How to use PhoneTrack :
* Create a tracking session. * Give the logging link\* to the mobile devices. Choose the [logging method](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#logging-methods) you prefer. * Watch the session's devices location in real time (or not) in PhoneTrack or share it with public pages.
(\*) Don't forget to set the device name in the link (rather than in the logging app settings). Replace "yourname" with the desired device name. Setting the device name in logging app settings only works with Owntracks, Traccar and OpenGTS.
On PhoneTrack main page, while watching a session, you can :
* üìç Display location history * ‚õõ Filter points * ‚úé Manually edit/add/delete points * ‚úé Edit devices (rename, change color/shape, move to another session) * ‚õ∂ Define geofencing zones for devices * ‚öá Define proximity alerts for device pairs * üñß Share a session to other Nextcloud users or with a public link (read-only) * üîó Generate public share links with optional restrictions (filters, device name, last positions only, geofencing simplification) * üñ´ Import/export a session in GPX format (one file with one track per device or one file per device) * üó† Display sessions statistics * üîí [Reserve a device name](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#device-name-reservation) to make sure only authorized user can log with this name * üóì Toggle session auto export and auto purge (daily/weekly/monthly) * ‚óî Choose what to do when point number quota is reached (block logging or delete oldest point)
Public page and public filtered page work like main page except there is only one session displayed, everything is read-only and there is no need to be logged in.
This app is tested on Nextcloud 17 with Firefox 57+ and Chromium.
This app is compatible with theming colors and accessibility themes !
This app is under development.
## Install
See the [AdminDoc](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/admindoc) for installation details.
Check [CHANGELOG](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#change-log) file to see what's new and what's coming in next release.
Check [AUTHORS](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/AUTHORS.md#authors) file to see complete list of authors.
## Known issues
* PhoneTrack **now works** with Nextcloud group restriction activated. See [admindoc](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/admindoc#issue-with-phonetrack-restricted-to-some-groups-in-nextcloud).
Any feedback will be appreciated.
## Donation
I develop this app during my free time.
* [Donate with Paypal](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=66PALMY8SF5JE) (you don't need a paypal account) * [Donate with Liberapay : ![Donate using Liberapay](https://liberapay.com/assets/widgets/donate.svg)](https://liberapay.com/eneiluj/donate)

info.description:
# PhoneTrack Nextcloud App
üì± PhoneTrack ist eine Nextcloud-Anwendung zur Verfolgung und Speicherung von Standorten mobiler Ger√§te.
üó∫ Sie erfasst Informationen von Protokollierungs-Apps auf Mobiltelefonen und zeigt diese dynamisch auf einer Karte an.
üåç Helfen Sie uns, diese App auf [PhoneTrack Crowdin Projekt](https://crowdin.com/project/phonetrack) zu √ºbersetzen.
‚öí Schauen Sie sich weitere M√∂glichkeiten in den [Mitwirkungsrichtlinien](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) an, wie Sie mitwirken k√∂nnen.
Wie PhoneTrack verwendet wird:
* Tracking-Sitzung erstellen * Protokollierungslink\* an die mobilen Ger√§te weitergeben Bevorzugte [Protokollierungsmethode](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#logging-methods) ausw√§hlen * Beobachten Sie den Ger√§testandort der Sitzung in Echtzeit (oder sp√§ter) in PhoneTrack oder teilen Sie ihn auf √∂ffentlichen Webseiten.
(\*) Vergessen Sie nicht, den Ger√§tenamen im Link (und nicht in den Einstellungen der Protokollierungsanwendung) einzustellen. Ersetzen Sie ‚ÄûMeinName‚Äù mit dem gew√ºnschten Ger√§tenamen. Das Einstellen des Ger√§tenamens in den Einstellungen der Protokollieruns-App funktioniert nur mit Owntracks, Traccar und OpenGTS.
Auf der Hauptseite von PhoneTrack k√∂nnen Sie w√§hrend einer Sitzung:
* üìç Standortverlauf anzeigen * ‚õõ Datenpunkte filtern * ‚úé Datenpunkte manuell bearbeiten/hinzuf√ºgen/l√∂schen * ‚úé Ger√§te bearbeiten (umbenennen, Farbe und Form √§ndern, in andere Sitzung verschieben) * ‚õ∂ Geofence-Zonen f√ºr Ger√§te festlegen * ‚öá Ann√§herungsbenachrichtigung f√ºr Ger√§tepaare festlegen * üñß Teilen Sie eine Sitzung mit anderen Nextcloud-Benutzern oder mit einem √∂ffentlichen Link (nur lesend) * üîó √ñffentliche Links mit optionalen Einschr√§nkungen (Filter, Ger√§tename, letzte Positionen, Geofence-Vereinfachung) teilen * üñ´ Sitzung im GPX-Format importieren/exportieren (eine Datei mit einer Aufzeichnung pro Ger√§t oder eine Datei pro Ger√§t) * üó† Sitzungsstatistiken anzeigen * üîí [Reservieren Sie einen Ger√§tenamen](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#device-name-reservation) um sicherzustellen, dass nur autorisierte Benutzer sich mit diesem Namen anmelden k√∂nnen * üóì Umschalten zwischen ‚ÄûAutomatisch exportieren‚Äù und ‚ÄûAutomatisch bereinigen‚Äù der Sitzung (t√§glich/w√∂chentlich/monatlich) * ‚óî Jeder Benutzer kann w√§hlen, was passieren soll, wenn die Menge der erlaubten Datenpunkte erreicht ist (Protokollierung unterbrechen oder √§ltesten Punkt l√∂schen)
√ñffentliche Seite und √∂ffentlich gefilterte Seite funktionieren wie die Hauptseite, au√üer dass nur eine Sitzung angezeigt wird, alles schreibgesch√ºtzt ist und keine Anmeldung erforderlich ist.
Diese App wurde unter Nextcloud 17 mit Firefox 57+ und Chromium getestet.
Diese App ist kompatibel mit Farbthemen und Themen zur Barrierefreiheit!
Die App wird aktiv weiterentwickelt.
## Installieren
Siehe [AdminDoc](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/admindoc) f√ºr Installationsdetails.
√úberpr√ºfen Sie das [√Ñnderungsprotokoll](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#change-log), um zu erfahren, was neu ist und was in der n√§chsten Version kommt.
[Autoren](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/AUTHORS.md#authors)-Datei ausw√§hlen, um eine Liste aller Autoren anzuzeigen.
## Bekannte Probleme
* PhoneTrack **funktioniert nun** mit der aktivierten Nextcloud-Gruppenbeschr√§nkung. Siehe [admindoc](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/admindoc#issue-with-phonetrack-restricted-to-some-groups-in-nextcloud).
Jegliches Feedback ist willkommen.
## Donation
I develop this app during my free time.
* [Donate with Paypal](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=66PALMY8SF5JE) (you don't need a paypal account) * [Donate with Liberapay : ![Donate using Liberapay](https://liberapay.com/assets/widgets/donate.svg)](https://liberapay.com/eneiluj/donate)

üì± Œ§Œø PhoneTrack ŒµŒØŒΩŒ±Œπ ŒºŒØŒ± Nextcloud ŒµœÜŒ±œÅŒºŒøŒ≥ŒÆ Œ≥ŒπŒ± œÑŒ∑ŒΩ Œ∫Œ±œÑŒ±Œ≥œÅŒ±œÜŒÆ Œ∫Œ±Œπ Œ±œÄŒøŒ∏ŒÆŒ∫ŒµœÖœÉŒ∑ œÑŒøœÄŒøŒ∏ŒµœÉŒπœéŒΩ Œ±œÄœå œÜŒøœÅŒ∑œÑŒ≠œÇ œÉœÖœÉŒ∫ŒµœÖŒ≠œÇ.
üó∫ ŒõŒ±ŒºŒ≤Œ¨ŒΩŒµŒπ œÄŒªŒ∑œÅŒøœÜŒøœÅŒØŒµœÇ Œ±œÄœå ŒµœÜŒ±œÅŒºŒøŒ≥Œ≠œÇ Œ∫Œ±œÑŒ±Œ≥œÅŒ±œÜŒÆœÇ œÉŒµ Œ∫ŒπŒΩŒ∑œÑŒ¨ œÑŒ∑ŒªŒ≠œÜœâŒΩŒ± Œ∫Œ±Œπ œÑŒ± ŒµŒºœÜŒ±ŒΩŒØŒ∂ŒµŒπ Œ¥œÖŒΩŒ±ŒºŒπŒ∫Œ¨ œÉŒµ œáŒ¨œÅœÑŒ∑.
üåç ŒíŒøŒ∑Œ∏ŒÆœÉœÑŒµ ŒºŒ±œÇ ŒΩŒ± ŒºŒµœÑŒ±œÜœÅŒ¨œÉŒøœÖŒºŒµ Œ±œÖœÑŒÆ œÑŒ∑ŒΩ ŒµœÜŒ±œÅŒºŒøŒ≥ŒÆ œÉœÑŒø [PhoneTrack Crowdin project](https://crowdin.com/project/phonetrack).
‚öí ŒîŒµŒØœÑŒµ Œ∫Œ±Œπ Œ¨ŒªŒªŒøœÖœÇ œÑœÅœåœÄŒøœÖœÇ Œ≥ŒπŒ± ŒΩŒ± Œ≤ŒøŒ∑Œ∏ŒÆœÉŒµœÑŒµ œÉœÑŒπœÇ [ŒøŒ¥Œ∑Œ≥ŒØŒµœÇ œÉœÖŒΩŒµŒπœÉœÜŒøœÅŒ¨œÇ](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
Œ†œâœÇ ŒΩŒ± œáœÅŒ∑œÉŒπŒºŒøœÄŒøŒπŒÆœÉŒµœÑŒµ œÑŒø PhoneTrack:
* ŒîŒ∑ŒºŒπŒøœÖœÅŒ≥ŒÆœÉœÑŒµ ŒºŒØŒ± œÉœÖŒΩŒµŒ¥œÅŒØŒ± Œ∫Œ±œÑŒ±Œ≥œÅŒ±œÜŒÆœÇ. * ŒîœéœÉœÑŒµ œÑŒøŒΩ œÉœçŒΩŒ¥ŒµœÉŒºŒø Œ∫Œ±œÑŒ±Œ≥œÅŒ±œÜŒÆœÇ\* œÉœÑŒπœÇ œÜŒøœÅŒ∑œÑŒ≠œÇ œÉœÖœÉŒ∫ŒµœÖŒ≠œÇ. ŒïœÄŒπŒªŒ≠ŒæœÑŒµ œÑŒ∑ [ŒºŒ≠Œ∏ŒøŒ¥Œø Œ∫Œ±œÑŒ±Œ≥œÅŒ±œÜŒÆœÇ](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#logging-methods) œÄŒøœÖ œÄœÅŒøœÑŒπŒºŒ¨œÑŒµ. * Œ†Œ±œÅŒ±Œ∫ŒøŒªŒøœÖŒ∏ŒÆœÉœÑŒµ œÑŒ∑ŒΩ œÑŒøœÄŒøŒ∏ŒµœÉŒØŒ± œÑœâŒΩ œÉœÖœÉŒ∫ŒµœÖœéŒΩ œÑŒ∑œÇ œÉœÖŒΩŒµŒ¥œÅŒØŒ±œÇ œÉŒµ œÄœÅŒ±Œ≥ŒºŒ±œÑŒπŒ∫œå œáœÅœåŒΩŒø (ŒÆ œåœáŒπ) œÉœÑŒø PhoneTrack ŒÆ Œ∫ŒøŒπŒΩŒøœÄŒøŒπŒÆœÉœÑŒµ œÉŒµ Œ¥Œ∑ŒºœåœÉŒπŒµœÇ œÉŒµŒªŒØŒ¥ŒµœÇ.
(\*) ŒúŒ∑ŒΩ ŒæŒµœáŒ¨œÉŒµœÑŒµ ŒΩŒ± ŒøœÅŒØœÉŒµœÑŒµ œÑŒø œåŒΩŒøŒºŒ± œÑŒ∑œÇ œÉœÖœÉŒ∫ŒµœÖŒÆœÇ œÉœÑŒø œÉœçŒΩŒ¥ŒµœÉŒºŒø (Œ∫Œ±Œπ œåœáŒπ œÉœÑŒπœÇ œÅœÖŒ∏ŒºŒØœÉŒµŒπœÇ œÑŒ∑œÇ ŒµœÜŒ±œÅŒºŒøŒ≥ŒÆœÇ Œ∫Œ±œÑŒ±Œ≥œÅŒ±œÜŒÆœÇ). ŒëŒΩœÑŒπŒ∫Œ±œÑŒ±œÉœÑŒÆœÉœÑŒµ œÑŒø "œÑŒøœåŒΩŒøŒºŒ±œÉŒ±œÇ" ŒºŒµ œÑŒ∑ŒΩ ŒµœÄŒπŒ∏œÖŒºŒ∑œÑŒÆ ŒøŒΩŒøŒºŒ±œÉŒØŒ± œÉœÖœÉŒ∫ŒµœÖŒÆœÇ. Œó œÅœçŒ∏ŒºŒπœÉŒ∑ œÑŒø ŒøŒΩœåŒºŒ±œÑŒøœÇ œÑŒ∑œÇ œÉœÖœÉŒ∫ŒµœÖŒÆœÇ œÉœÑŒπœÇ œÅœÖŒ∏ŒºŒØœÉŒµŒπœÇ œÑŒ∑œÇ ŒµœÜŒ±œÅŒºŒøŒ≥ŒÆœÇ Œ∫Œ±œÑŒ±Œ≥œÅŒ±œÜŒÆœÇ ŒªŒµŒπœÑŒøœÖœÅŒ≥ŒµŒØ ŒºœåŒΩŒø ŒºŒµ œÑŒø Owntracks, œÑŒø Traccar Œ∫Œ±Œπ œÑŒø OpenGTS.
Œ£œÑŒ∑ŒΩ Œ∫ŒµŒΩœÑœÅŒπŒ∫ŒÆ œÉŒµŒªŒØŒ¥Œ± œÑŒøœÖ PhoneTrack, ŒµŒΩœé œÄŒ±œÅŒ±Œ∫ŒøŒªŒøœÖŒ∏ŒµŒØœÑŒµ ŒºŒπŒ± œÉœÖŒΩŒµŒ¥œÅŒØŒ±, ŒºœÄŒøœÅŒµŒØœÑŒµ :
* üìç ŒùŒ± ŒµŒºœÜŒ±ŒΩŒØœÉŒµœÑŒµ œÑŒø ŒπœÉœÑŒøœÅŒπŒ∫œå œÑŒøœÄŒøŒ∏ŒµœÉŒØŒ±œÇ * ‚õõ ŒùŒ± œÜŒπŒªœÑœÅŒ¨œÅŒµœÑŒµ œÉŒ∑ŒºŒµŒØŒ± * ‚úé ŒùŒ± Œ∫Œ¨ŒΩŒµœÑŒµ œáŒµŒπœÅŒøŒ∫ŒØŒΩŒ∑œÑŒ∑ œáœÅœéŒºŒ±œÑŒøœÇ/œÉœáŒÆŒºŒ±œÑŒøœÇ, ŒºŒµœÑŒ±Œ∫ŒØŒΩŒ∑œÉŒ∑ œÉŒµ Œ¨ŒªŒªŒ∑ œÉœÖŒΩŒµŒ¥œÅŒØŒ±) * ‚õ∂ ŒùŒ± ŒøœÅŒØœÉŒµœÑŒµ Œ≥ŒµœâœÜœÅŒ±Œ∫œÑŒπŒ∫Œ≠œÇ Œ∂œéŒΩŒµœÇ Œ≥ŒπŒ± œÑŒπœÇ œÉœÖœÉŒ∫ŒµœÖŒ≠œÇ * ‚öá ŒùŒ± ŒøœÅŒØœÉŒµœÑŒµ ŒµŒπŒ¥ŒøœÄŒøŒπŒÆœÉŒµŒπœÇ ŒµŒ≥Œ≥œçœÑŒ∑œÑŒ±œÇ Œ≥ŒπŒ± œÑŒπœÇ œÉœÖŒΩŒ¥ŒµŒ¥ŒµŒºŒ≠ŒΩŒµœÇ œÉœÖœÉŒ∫ŒµœÖŒ≠œÇ * üñß ŒùŒ± Œ∫ŒøŒπŒΩŒøœÄŒøŒπŒÆœÉŒµœÑŒµ ŒºŒπŒ± œÉœÖŒΩŒµŒ¥œÅŒØŒ± œÉŒµ Œ¨ŒªŒªŒøœÖœÇ œáœÅŒÆœÉœÑŒµœÇ œÑŒøœÖ Nextcloud ŒÆ ŒºŒµ Œ¥Œ∑ŒºœåœÉŒπŒø œÉœçŒΩŒ¥ŒµœÉŒºŒø (ŒºœåŒΩŒø Œ≥ŒπŒ± Œ±ŒΩŒ¨Œ≥ŒΩœâœÉŒ∑) * üîó ŒùŒ± Œ¥Œ∑ŒºŒπŒøœÖœÅŒ≥ŒÆœÉŒµœÑŒµ œÉœÖŒΩŒ¥Œ≠œÉŒºŒøœÖœÇ Œ¥Œ∑ŒºœåœÉŒπŒ±œÇ Œ∫ŒøŒπŒΩŒøœÄŒøŒØŒ∑œÉŒ∑œÇ ŒºŒµ œÄœÅŒøŒ±ŒπœÅŒµœÑŒπŒ∫ŒøœçœÇ œÄŒµœÅŒπŒøœÅŒπœÉŒºŒøœçœÇ (œÜŒØŒªœÑœÅŒ±, œåŒΩŒøŒºŒ± œÉœÖœÉŒ∫ŒµœÖŒÆœÇ, œÑŒµŒªŒµœÖœÑŒ±ŒØŒµœÇ Œ∏Œ≠œÉŒµŒπœÇ ŒºœåŒΩŒø, Œ±œÄŒªŒøœÄŒøŒØŒ∑œÉŒ∑ Œ≠ŒΩŒ± Œ±œÅœáŒµŒØŒø Œ±ŒΩŒ¨ œÉœÖœÉŒ∫ŒµœÖŒÆ) * üó† ŒùŒ± œÄœÅŒøŒ≤Œ¨ŒªŒµœÑŒµ œÉœÑŒ±œÑŒπœÉœÑŒπŒ∫Œ¨ œÑŒ∑œÇ œÉœÖŒΩŒµŒ¥œÅŒØŒ±œÇ * üîí [ŒùŒ± Œ¥ŒµœÉŒºŒµœçœÉŒµœÑŒµ Œ≠ŒΩŒ± œåŒΩŒøŒºŒ± œÉœÖœÉŒ∫ŒµœÖŒÆœÇ](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#device-name-reservation) Œ≥ŒπŒ± ŒΩŒ± Œ≤ŒµŒ≤Œ±ŒπœâŒ∏ŒµŒØœÑŒµ œåœÑŒπ ŒºœåŒΩŒø Œ≠ŒΩŒ±œÇ ŒµŒæŒøœÖœÉŒπŒøŒ¥ŒøœÑŒ∑ŒºŒ≠ŒΩŒøœÇ Œó Œ¥Œ∑ŒºœåœÉŒπŒ± œÉŒµŒªŒØŒ¥Œ± Œ∫Œ±Œπ Œ∑ Œ¥Œ∑ŒºœåœÉŒπŒ± œÜŒπŒªœÑœÅŒ±œÅŒπœÉŒºŒ≠ŒΩŒ∑ œÉŒµŒªŒØŒ¥Œ± ŒªŒµŒπœÑŒøœÖœÅŒ≥ŒµŒØ œÉŒ±ŒΩ Œ∫œçœÅŒπŒ± œÉŒµŒªŒØŒ¥Œ±, ŒºŒµ ŒµŒæŒ±ŒØœÅŒµœÉŒ∑ Œ±ŒΩ œÖœÄŒ¨œÅœáŒµŒπ ŒºœåŒΩŒø ŒºŒØŒ± ŒµŒºœÜŒ±ŒΩŒπŒ∂œåŒºŒµŒΩŒ∑ œÉœÖŒΩŒµŒ¥œÅŒØŒ±, œÑŒ± œÄŒ¨ŒΩœÑŒ± ŒµŒØŒΩŒ±Œπ ŒºœåŒΩŒø Œ≥ŒπŒ± Œ±ŒΩŒ¨Œ≥ŒΩœâœÉŒ∑ Œ∫Œ±Œπ Œ¥ŒµŒΩ œÖœÄŒ¨œÅœáŒµŒπ Œ±ŒΩŒ¨Œ≥Œ∫Œ∑ œÉœçŒΩŒ¥ŒµœÉŒ∑œÇ.
ŒëœÖœÑŒÆ Œ∑ ŒµœÜŒ±œÅŒºŒøŒ≥ŒÆ ŒµŒªŒ≠Œ≥œáŒ∏Œ∑Œ∫Œµ œÉœÑŒø Nextcloud 17 ŒºŒµ œÑŒø Firefox 57+ Œ∫Œ±Œπ œÑŒø Chromium.
Œó ŒµœÜŒ±œÅŒºŒøŒ≥ŒÆ ŒµŒØŒΩŒ±Œπ œÉœÖŒºŒ≤Œ±œÑŒÆ ŒºŒµ Œ∏Œ≠ŒºŒ±œÑŒ± œáœÅœâŒºŒ¨œÑœâŒΩ Œ∫Œ±Œπ œÄœÅŒøœÉŒ≤Œ±œÉŒπŒºœåœÑŒ∑œÑŒ±œÇ!

## ŒïŒ≥Œ∫Œ±œÑŒ¨œÉœÑŒ±œÉŒ∑
ŒîŒµŒØœÑŒµ œÑŒø [AdminDoc](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/admindoc) Œ≥ŒπŒ± ŒªŒµœÄœÑŒøŒºŒ≠œÅŒµŒπŒµœÇ ŒµŒ≥Œ∫Œ±œÑŒ¨œÉœÑŒ±œÉŒ∑œÇ.

info.summary: Track and display phone's positions in real time
info.description:
# PhoneTrack Nextcloud application
üì± PhoneTrack is a Nextcloud application to track and store mobile device's locations.
üó∫ It receives information from mobile phone's logging apps and displays it dynamically on a map.
üåç Help us to translate this app on [PhoneTrack Crowdin project](https://crowdin.com/project/phonetrack).
‚öí Check out other ways to help in the [contribution guidelines](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
How to use PhoneTrack :
* Create a tracking session. * Give the logging link\* to the mobile devices. Choose the [logging method](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#logging-methods) you prefer. * Watch the session's devices location in real time (or not) in PhoneTrack or share it with public pages.
(\*) Don't forget to set the device name in the link (rather than in the logging app settings). Replace "yourname" with the desired device name. Setting the device name in logging app settings only works with Owntracks, Traccar and OpenGTS.
On PhoneTrack main page, while watching a session, you can :
* üìç Display location history * ‚õõ Filter points * ‚úé Manually edit/add/delete points * ‚úé Edit devices (rename, change colour/shape, move to another session) * ‚õ∂ Define geofencing zones for devices * ‚öá Define proximity alerts for device pairs * üñß Share a session to other Nextcloud users or with a public link (read-only) * üîó Generate public share links with optional restrictions (filters, device name, last positions only, geofencing simplification) * üñ´ Import/export a session in GPX format (one file with one track per device or one file per device) * üó† Display sessions statistics * üîí [Reserve a device name](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#device-name-reservation) to make sure only authorised user can log with this name * üóì Toggle session auto export and auto purge (daily/weekly/monthly) * ‚óî Choose what to do when point number quota is reached (block logging or delete oldest point)
Public page and public filtered page work like main page except there is only one session displayed, everything is read-only and there is no need to be logged in.
This app is tested on Nextcloud 17 with Firefox 57+ and Chromium.
This app is compatible with theming colours and accessibility themes !
This app is under development.
## Install
See the [AdminDoc](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/admindoc) for installation details.
Check [CHANGELOG](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#change-log) file to see what's new and what's coming in next release.
Check [AUTHORS](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/AUTHORS.md#authors) file to see complete list of authors.
## Known issues
* PhoneTrack **now works** with Nextcloud group restriction activated. See [admindoc](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/admindoc#issue-with-phonetrack-restricted-to-some-groups-in-nextcloud).
Any feedback will be appreciated.
## Donation
I develop this app during my free time.
* [Donate with Paypal](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=66PALMY8SF5JE) (you don't need a paypal account) * [Donate with Liberapay : ![Donate using Liberapay](https://liberapay.com/assets/widgets/donate.svg)](https://liberapay.com/eneiluj/donate)

info.summary: Track and display phones positions in real time
info.description:
# PhoneTrack Nextcloud application
üì± PhoneTrack is a Nextcloud application to track and store mobile devices locations.
üó∫ It receives information from mobile phones logging apps and displays it dynamically on a map.
üåç Help us to translate this app on [PhoneTrack Crowdin project](https://crowdin.com/project/phonetrack).
‚öí Check out other ways to help in the [contribution guidelines](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
How to use PhoneTrack :
* Create a tracking session. * Give the logging link\* to the mobile devices. Choose the [logging method](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#logging-methods) you prefer. * Watch the session's devices location in real time (or not) in PhoneTrack or share it with public pages.
(\*) Don't forget to set the device name in the link (rather than in the logging app settings). Replace "yourname" with the desired device name. Setting the device name in logging app settings only works with Owntracks, Traccar and OpenGTS.
On PhoneTrack main page, while watching a session, you can :
* üìç Display location history * ‚õõ Filter points * ‚úé Manually edit/add/delete points * ‚úé Edit devices (rename, change color/shape, move to another session) * ‚õ∂ Define geofencing zones for devices * ‚öá Define proximity alerts for device pairs * üñß Share a session to other Nextcloud users or with a public link (read-only) * üîó Generate public share links with optional restrictions (filters, device name, last positions only, geofencing simplification) * üñ´ Import/export a session in GPX format (one file with one track per device or one file per device) * üó† Display sessions statistics * üîí [Reserve a device name](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#device-name-reservation) to make sure only authorized user can log with this name * üóì Toggle session auto export and auto purge (daily/weekly/monthly) * ‚óî Choose what to do when point number quota is reached (block logging or delete oldest point)
Public page and public filtered page work like main page except there is only one session displayed, everything is read-only and there is no need to be logged in.
This app is tested on Nextcloud 17 with Firefox 57+ and Chromium.
This app is compatible with theming colors and accessibility themes !
This app is under development.
## Install
See the [AdminDoc](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/admindoc) for installation details.
Check [CHANGELOG](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#change-log) file to see what's new and what's coming in next release.
Check [AUTHORS](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/AUTHORS.md#authors) file to see complete list of authors.
## Known issues
* PhoneTrack **now works** with Nextcloud group restriction activated. See [admindoc](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/admindoc#issue-with-phonetrack-restricted-to-some-groups-in-nextcloud).
Any feedback will be appreciated.
## Donation
I develop this app during my free time.
* [Donate with Paypal](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=66PALMY8SF5JE) (you don't need a paypal account) * [Donate with Liberapay : ![Donate using Liberapay](https://liberapay.com/assets/widgets/donate.svg)](https://liberapay.com/eneiluj/donate)

(\*) Non esquezas establecer o nome do dispositivo na ligaz√≥n (mellor que nos axustes da app de rexistro). Muda o teu "nome de usuaria" co nome que queiras darlle ao dispositivo. Establecer o nome do dispositivo nos axustes da app s√≥ funciona con Owntracks, Traccar e OpenGTS.
Na p√°xina principal de PhoneTrack, ao ver unha sesi√≥n, podes:
* üìçMostrar o historial de localizaci√≥ns * ‚õõ Filtrar puntos * ‚úé Editar/engadir/eliminar puntos manualmente * ‚úé Editar dispsitivos (cambio de nome, cambio de forma/cor, ir a outra sesi√≥n) * ‚õ∂ Definir zonas privadas para os dispositivos * ‚öá Definir alertas de proximidiade para parellas de dispositivos * üñß Compartir a sesi√≥n con outras usuarias de Nextcloud ou cunha ligaz√≥n p√∫blica (s√≥ lectura) * üîó Crear ligaz√≥ns p√∫blicas con restrici√≥ns optativas (filtros, nome do dispositivo, s√≥ √∫ltimas posici√≥ns, protecci√≥n simplificada da posici√≥n) * üñ´ Importar/exportar unha sesi√≥n en formato GPX (un ficheiro cunha pista por dispositivo ou un ficheiro por dispositivo) * üó† Mostar estat√≠sticas da sesi√≥n * üîí [Reservar no do dispositivo](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#device-name-reservation) para ter a certeza de que s√≥ a usuaria autorizada pode conectar con este nome * üóì Activar a exportaci√≥n autom√°tica da sesi√≥n e autoeliminaci√≥n (diaria/semanal/mensual) * ‚óî Elixe que queres que aconteza cando acadas un determinado n√∫mero de puntos (deixar de gravar ou eliminar os m√°is antigos)
P√°xina p√∫blica e p√°xina p√∫blica filtrada funcionan como p√°xina principal excepto se s√≥ hai unha sesi√≥n que mostrar, todo est√° en modo s√≥-lectura e non precisas ter sesi√≥n iniciada.
Esta app esta probada en Nextcloud 17 e Firefox 57+ e Chromium.
Esta app √© compatible coas cores e accesibilidade dos decorados da instancia!
App en desenvolvemento.
## Instalaci√≥n
Le a [Documentaci√≥n](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/admindoc) para detalles da instalaci√≥n.
Comproba o ficheiro de [REXISTRO de cambios](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#change-log) para co√±ecer as novidades e o que est√° por vir en pr√≥ximas versi√≥ns.
No ficheiro de persoas [AUTORAS](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/AUTHORS.md#authors) podes ver quen se encarga do desenvolvemento.
## Problemas co√±ecidos
* Agora PhoneTrack **funciona correctamente** a√≠nda estando activada a restrici√≥n de grupo en Nextcloud. Le a [documentaci√≥n](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/admindoc#issue-with-phonetrack-restricted-to-some-groups-in-nextcloud) para admins.
Calquera opini√≥n e revisi√≥n √© ben recibida.
## Donation
I develop this app during my free time.
* [Donate with Paypal](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=66PALMY8SF5JE) (you don't need a paypal account) * [Donate with Liberapay : ![Donate using Liberapay](https://liberapay.com/assets/widgets/donate.svg)](https://liberapay.com/eneiluj/donate)

info.summary: Track and display phones positions in real time
info.description:
# PhoneTrack Nextcloud application
üì± PhoneTrack is a Nextcloud application to track and store mobile devices locations.
üó∫ It receives information from mobile phones logging apps and displays it dynamically on a map.
üåç Help us to translate this app on [PhoneTrack Crowdin project](https://crowdin.com/project/phonetrack).
‚öí Check out other ways to help in the [contribution guidelines](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
How to use PhoneTrack :
* Create a tracking session. * Give the logging link\* to the mobile devices. Choose the [logging method](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#logging-methods) you prefer. * Watch the session's devices location in real time (or not) in PhoneTrack or share it with public pages.
(\*) Don't forget to set the device name in the link (rather than in the logging app settings). Replace "yourname" with the desired device name. Setting the device name in logging app settings only works with Owntracks, Traccar and OpenGTS.
On PhoneTrack main page, while watching a session, you can :
* üìç Display location history * ‚õõ Filter points * ‚úé Manually edit/add/delete points * ‚úé Edit devices (rename, change color/shape, move to another session) * ‚õ∂ Define geofencing zones for devices * ‚öá Define proximity alerts for device pairs * üñß Share a session to other Nextcloud users or with a public link (read-only) * üîó Generate public share links with optional restrictions (filters, device name, last positions only, geofencing simplification) * üñ´ Import/export a session in GPX format (one file with one track per device or one file per device) * üó† Display sessions statistics * üîí [Reserve a device name](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#device-name-reservation) to make sure only authorized user can log with this name * üóì Toggle session auto export and auto purge (daily/weekly/monthly) * ‚óî Choose what to do when point number quota is reached (block logging or delete oldest point)
Public page and public filtered page work like main page except there is only one session displayed, everything is read-only and there is no need to be logged in.
This app is tested on Nextcloud 17 with Firefox 57+ and Chromium.
This app is compatible with theming colors and accessibility themes !
This app is under development.
## Install
See the [AdminDoc](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/admindoc) for installation details.
Check [CHANGELOG](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#change-log) file to see what's new and what's coming in next release.
Check [AUTHORS](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/AUTHORS.md#authors) file to see complete list of authors.
## Known issues
* PhoneTrack **now works** with Nextcloud group restriction activated. See [admindoc](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/admindoc#issue-with-phonetrack-restricted-to-some-groups-in-nextcloud).
Any feedback will be appreciated.
## Donation
I develop this app during my free time.
* [Donate with Paypal](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=66PALMY8SF5JE) (you don't need a paypal account) * [Donate with Liberapay : ![Donate using Liberapay](https://liberapay.com/assets/widgets/donate.svg)](https://liberapay.com/eneiluj/donate)

info.summary: Menampilkan dan melacak posisi perangkat secara nyata
info.description:
# Aplikasi PhoneTrack di Nextcloud
PhoneTrack adalah aplikasi di nextcloud yang digunakan untuk melacak serta menyimpan posisi lokasi dari perangkat mobile.
PhoneTrack menerima informasi log dari perangkat mobile dan menampilkan-nya secara dinamis di peta.
üåç Bantu kami untuk alih bahasa di [PhoneTrack Crowdin project](https://crowdin.com/project/phonetrack).
‚öí Silahkan kunjungi alternatif lain untuk membantu kami di [contribution guidelines](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
Bagaimana cara menggunakan PhoneTrack :
* Buatlah sesi pelacakan. * Berikan alamat log \* ke perangkat mobile. Pilihlah [metode log](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#logging-methods) yang sesuai. * PhoneTrack dapat memantau lokasi sesi perangkat baik secara langsung maupun tidak, atau bahkan dapat di bagikan kepada pihak lain.
(\*) Pastikan untuk memberi nama atas perangkat pada alamat url (hindari merubah di menu pengaturan pada aplikasi). Rubalah "yourname" dengan nama yang di-inginkan. Perubahan nama perangkat di menu pengaturan aplikasi hanya dapat bekerja di aplikasi pelacakan Owntracks, Traccar dan OpenGTS.
Pada halaman utama PhoneTrack, saat memantau sebuah sesi, anda dapat melakukan beberapa hal, antara lain :
* üìç Menampilkan lokasi lampau * ‚õõ Titik penyaring * ‚úé Rubah/tambah/hapus titik secara manual * ‚úé Rubah perangkat (ganti nama, merubah bentuk/warna, pindahkan ke sesi lain) * ‚õ∂ Membuat area "geofencing" untuk perangkat * ‚öá Membuat peringatan atas sebuah perangkat jika saling berdekatan * üñß Berbagi sesi ke pengguna Nextcloud lainnya atau ke pihak lain (hanya lihat) * üîó Membuat alamat untuk di bagi secara umum dengan beberapa batasan (saring, nama perangkat, posisi terakhir dan "geofencing" sederhana) * üñ´ Impor/ekspor sebuah sesi dalam format GPX (satu berkas dengan satu pelacakan untuk setiap perangkat atau satu berkas untuk satu perangkat) * üó† Menampilkan statistik sesi * üîí [Pesan nama perangkat](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#device-name-reservation) sehingga hanya yang di perbolehkan saja menggunakan nama tersebut * üóì Perpindahan sesi ekspor otomatis dan penghapusan otomatis (harian/mingguan/bulanan) * ‚óî Memilih untuk menentukan ketika jumlah kuota titik telah habis (hapus titik sebelumnya atau membatasi log)
Halaman untuk umum dan yang ter-saring bekerja seperti halaman utama hanya saja tersedia untuk satu sesi, semuanya tidak perlu akses khusus.
Aplikasi ini telah di ujicoba pada seri Nextcloud 17 dengan menggunakan Firefox 57+ dan Chromium.
Aplikasi ini juga dapat merubah warna tema dan tema aksesibilitas !
Fitur ini dalam pengembangan.
## Memasang
Silahkan mengunjungi [AdminDoc](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/admindoc) untuk lebih detail tentang pemasangan.
Silahkan periksa berkas [CHANGELOG](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#change-log) untuk melihat daftar perubahan dan rencana pengembangan.
Silahkan periksa berkas [AUTHORS](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/AUTHORS.md#authors) untuk melihat daftar para pengarang.
## Kendala yang Diketahui
* PhoneTrack **dapat bekerja** dengan fitur pembatasan grup di Nextcloud. Kunjungi [admindoc](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/admindoc#issue-with-phonetrack-restricted-to-some-groups-in-nextcloud).
Saran dari anda dapat membantu kami lebih baik.
## Donation
I develop this app during my free time.
* [Donate with Paypal](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=66PALMY8SF5JE) (you don't need a paypal account) * [Donate with Liberapay : ![Donate using Liberapay](https://liberapay.com/assets/widgets/donate.svg)](https://liberapay.com/eneiluj/donate)
info.summary: Traccia e visualizza le posizioni dei telefoni in tempo reale
info.description:
# Applicazione PhoneTrack per Nextcloud
üì± PhoneTrack √® un'applicazione per Nextcloud per monitorare e memorizzare le posizioni dei dispositivi mobili.
üó∫ riceve informazioni dalle app di registrazione dei telefoni cellulari e la visualizza dinamicamente su una mappa.
„Äì Aiutaci a tradurre questa app su [PhoneTrack Crowdin project](https://crowdin.com/project/phonetrack).
‚öí Scopri altri modi per aiutare nelle linee guida [contributivo](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
Come utilizzare PhoneTrack:
* Crea una sessione di tracciamento. * Fornire il collegamento di registrazione\* ai dispositivi mobili. Scegli il [ metodo di registrazione ](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#logging-methods) che preferisci. * Guarda la posizione dei dispositivi della sessione in tempo reale (o no) a PhoneTrack o condividilo con pagine pubbliche.
(\*) Non dimenticare di impostare il nome del dispositivo nel link (piuttosto che nelle impostazioni di registrazione dell'app). Sostituisci "yourname" con il nome del dispositivo desiderato. L'impostazione del nome del dispositivo nelle impostazioni di registrazione delle app funziona solo con le tracce proprie, Traccar e OpenGTS.
Nella pagina principale di PhoneTrack, mentre segui una sessione, √® possibile:
* üìç Visualizza la cronologia della posizione * ‚õõ Filtra punti * ‚úé Modifica/aggiungi/elimina punti manualmente * ‚úé Modifica dispositivi (rinomina, cambia colore/forma, sposta in un'altra sessione) * ‚õ∂ Definisci zone di Geo-perimetro per i dispositivi\\ * ‚öá Definisci gli avvisi di prossimit√† per gli accoppiamenti del dispositivo * üñß Condividi una sessione ad altri utenti Nextcloud o con un link pubblico (sola lettura) * üîó Genera collegamenti di condivisione pubblica con restrizioni opzionali (filtri, nome del dispositivo, solo posizioni finali, semplificazione Geo-perimetro) * üñ´ Importa/esporta una sessione in formato GPX (un file con una traccia per dispositivo o un file per dispositivo) * üó† Visualizza le statistiche delle sessioni * üîí [Riserva un nome del dispositivo](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#device-name-reservation) per assicurarsi che solo l'utente autorizzato possa accedere con questo nome * üóì Toggle esportazione automatica della sessione e cancellazione automatica (giornaliera/settimanale/mensile) * ó©å Scegli cosa fare quando si raggiunge la quota del numero di punti (blocca la registrazione o elimina il punto pi√π vecchio)
Pagina pubblica e pagina filtrata pubblica come pagina principale, ad eccezione di una sola sessione visualizzata, tutto √® in sola lettura e non c'√® bisogno di accedere.
Questa app √® testata su Nextcloud 17 con Firefox 57+ e Chromium.
Questa app √® compatibile con i colori tematici e i temi di accessibilit√†!
Questa app √® in fase di sviluppo.
## Installa
Vedi [AdminDoc](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/admindoc) per i dettagli di installazione.
Controlla [CHANGELOG](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#change-log) il file per vedere cosa √® nuovo e cosa sta arrivando con la prossima versione.
Seleziona il file [AUTHORS](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/AUTHORS.md#authors) per vedere l'elenco completo degli autori.
## Problemi noti
* PhoneTrack **ora funziona** con la restrizione del gruppo Nextcloud attivata. Vedi [admindoc](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/admindoc#issue-with-phonetrack-restricted-to-some-groups-in-nextcloud).
Qualsiasi feedback sar√† apprezzato.
## Donation
I develop this app during my free time.
* [Donate with Paypal](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=66PALMY8SF5JE) (you don't need a paypal account) * [Donate with Liberapay : ![Donate using Liberapay](https://liberapay.com/assets/widgets/donate.svg)](https://liberapay.com/eneiluj/donate)

info.description:
# PhoneTrack Nextcloud application
üì± PhoneTrack is a Nextcloud application to track and store mobile devices locations.
üó∫ It receives information from mobile phones logging apps and displays it dynamically on a map.
üåç Help us to translate this app on [PhoneTrack Crowdin project](https://crowdin.com/project/phonetrack).
‚öí Check out other ways to help in the [contribution guidelines](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
How to use PhoneTrack :
* Create a tracking session. * Give the logging link\* to the mobile devices. Choose the [logging method](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#logging-methods) you prefer. * Watch the session's devices location in real time (or not) in PhoneTrack or share it with public pages.
(\*) Don't forget to set the device name in the link (rather than in the logging app settings). Replace "yourname" with the desired device name. Setting the device name in logging app settings only works with Owntracks, Traccar and OpenGTS.
On PhoneTrack main page, while watching a session, you can :
* üìç Display location history * ‚õõ Filter points * ‚úé Manually edit/add/delete points * ‚úé Edit devices (rename, change color/shape, move to another session) * ‚õ∂ Define geofencing zones for devices * ‚öá Define proximity alerts for device pairs * üñß Share a session to other Nextcloud users or with a public link (read-only) * üîó Generate public share links with optional restrictions (filters, device name, last positions only, geofencing simplification) * üñ´ Import/export a session in GPX format (one file with one track per device or one file per device) * üó† Display sessions statistics * üîí [Reserve a device name](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#device-name-reservation) to make sure only authorized user can log with this name * üóì Toggle session auto export and auto purge (daily/weekly/monthly) * ‚óî Choose what to do when point number quota is reached (block logging or delete oldest point)
Public page and public filtered page work like main page except there is only one session displayed, everything is read-only and there is no need to be logged in.
This app is tested on Nextcloud 17 with Firefox 57+ and Chromium.
This app is compatible with theming colors and accessibility themes !
This app is under development.
## Install
See the [AdminDoc](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/admindoc) for installation details.
Check [CHANGELOG](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#change-log) file to see what's new and what's coming in next release.
Check [AUTHORS](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/AUTHORS.md#authors) file to see complete list of authors.
## Known issues
* PhoneTrack **now works** with Nextcloud group restriction activated. See [admindoc](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/admindoc#issue-with-phonetrack-restricted-to-some-groups-in-nextcloud).
Any feedback will be appreciated.
## Donation
I develop this app during my free time.
* [Donate with Paypal](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=66PALMY8SF5JE) (you don't need a paypal account) * [Donate with Liberapay : ![Donate using Liberapay](https://liberapay.com/assets/widgets/donate.svg)](https://liberapay.com/eneiluj/donate)

info.summary: Track en weergave van telefoonposities in real time
info.description:
# PhoneTrack Nextcloud applicatie
üì± PhoneTrack is een Nextcloud applicatie voor het bijhouden en opslaan van locaties van mobiele apparaten.
üó∫ Het ontvangt informatie van logging apps van mobiele telefoons en geeft deze dynamisch weer op een kaart.
üåç Help ons deze app te vertalen op [PhoneTrack Crowdin project](https://crowdin.com/project/phonetrack).
‚öí Bekijk andere manieren om te helpen in de [bijdragerichtlijnen](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
Hoe gebruik je PhoneTrack:
* Maak een tracking sessie. * Geef de logging link\* aan de mobiele apparaten. Kies de [logging methode](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#logging-methods) van jouw voorkeur. * Bekijk de locatie van sessieapparaten in realtime (of niet) in PhoneTrack of deel deze met publieke links.
(\*) Vergeet niet om de apparaatnaam in de link te zetten (in plaats van in de logging app-instellingen). Vervang 'yourname' met jouw gewenste apparaatnaam. Het instellen van de apparaatnaam in de logging app-instellingen werkt alleen met Owntracks, Traccar en OpenGTS.
Op de PhoneTrack hoofdpagina, kun je terwijl je een sessie bekijkt:
* üìç Locatiegeschiedenis weergeven * ‚õõ Punten filteren * ‚úé Handmatig bewerken/toevoegen/verwijderen van punten * ‚úé Apparaten bewerken (hernoemen, kleur/vorm wijzigen, naar een andere sessie verplaatsen) * ‚õ∂ Geofencing zones defini√´ren voor apparaten * ‚öá Nabijheidswaarschuwingen voor apparaatparen defini√´ren * üñß Een sessie delen met andere Nextcloud gebruikers of met een publieke link (alleen-lezen) * üîó Openbare share links genereren met optionele beperkingen (filters, apparaatnaam, enkel laatste posities, geofencing vereenvoudiging) * üñ´ Een sessie importeren/exporteren in GPX-formaat (√©√©n bestand met √©√©n track per apparaat of √©√©n bestand per apparaat) * üó† Sessiestatistieken weergeven * üîí [Een apparaatnaam reserveren](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#device-name-reservation) om ervoor te zorgen dat alleen geautoriseerde gebruikers met deze naam kunnen inloggen * üóì Activeren van automatische sessie export en automatisch opruimen (dagelijks/wekelijks/maandelijks) * ‚óî Kies wat er moet gebeuren als het puntentotaal is bereikt (blokkering van de logging of verwijdering van het oudste punt)
Openbare pagina's en openbare gefilterde pagina's werken zoals de hoofdpagina, behalve dat er slechts √©√©n sessie wordt weergegeven, alles wordt alleen-lezen en er hoeft niet ingelogd te worden.
Deze app is getest op Nextcloud 17 met Firefox 57+ en Chromium.
Deze app is compatibel met themakleuren en toegankelijkheidsthema's !
Deze app is in ontwikkeling.
## Installatie
Zie de [AdminDoc](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/admindoc) voor de installatiedetails.
Controleer [CHANGELOG](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#change-log) bestand om te zien wat er nieuw is en wat er in de volgende release komt.
Controleer het bestand [AUTHORS](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/AUTHORS.md#authors) om de volledige lijst van auteurs te zien.
## Bekende problemen
* PhoneTrack **werkt nu** met Nextcloud groepsbeperking geactiveerd. Zie [admindoc](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/admindoc#issue-with-phonetrack-restricted-to-some-groups-in-nextcloud).
Elke feedback wordt gewaardeerd.
## Donation
I develop this app during my free time.
* [Donate with Paypal](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=66PALMY8SF5JE) (you don't need a paypal account) * [Donate with Liberapay : ![Donate using Liberapay](https://liberapay.com/assets/widgets/donate.svg)](https://liberapay.com/eneiluj/donate)

* –°–æ–∑–¥–∞—Ç—å —Å–µ—Å—Å–∏—é. * –£–∫–∞–∑–∞—Ç—å —Å—Å—ã–ª–∫–∏ –Ω–∞ –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ —É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∞. –í—ã–±–µ—Ä–∏—Ç–µ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ø–æ—á—Ç–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–π [–º–µ—Ç–æ–¥ –∑–∞–ø–∏—Å–∏ ](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#logging-methods). * –ü—Ä–æ—Å–º–æ—Ç—Ä –ø–æ–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è —É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤ —Å–µ—Å—Å–∏–∏ –≤ —Ä–µ–∂–∏–º–µ —Ä–µ–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ –≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–∏ (–∏–ª–∏ –Ω–µ—Ç) –≤ PhoneTrack –∏–ª–∏ –ø–æ–∫–∞–∑ –∏—Ö –Ω–∞ –ø—É–±–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã—Ö —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—Ü–∞—Ö.
(\*) –ù–µ –∑–∞–±—É–¥—å—Ç–µ —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∏—Ç—å –∏–º—è —É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∞ –≤ —Å—Å—ã–ª–∫–µ (–∞ –Ω–µ –≤ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞—Ö –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è –¥–ª—è –≤—Ö–æ–¥–∞). –ó–∞–º–µ–Ω–∏—Ç–µ "yourname" –Ω–∞ –Ω—É–∂–Ω–æ–µ –∏–º—è —É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∞. –£—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∞ –∏–º–µ–Ω–∏ —É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∞ –≤ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞—Ö –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π –∂—É—Ä–Ω–∞–ª–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ—Ç —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ —Å Owntracks, Traccar –∏ OpenGTS.

* üìç–û—Ç–æ–±—Ä–∞–∑–∏—Ç—å –∏—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—é –º–µ—Å—Ç–æ –ø–æ–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π * ‚õõ –§–∏–ª—å—Ç—Ä —Ç–æ—á–µ–∫ * ‚úé –í—Ä—É—á–Ω—É—é –∏–∑–º–µ–Ω–∏—Ç—å/–¥–æ–±–∞–≤–∏—Ç—å/—É–¥–∞–ª–∏—Ç—å —Ç–æ—á–∫–∏ * ‚úé –†–µ–¥–∞–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∞ (–ø–µ—Ä–µ–∏–º–µ–Ω–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å, –∏–∑–º–µ–Ω–∏—Ç—å —Ü–≤–µ—Ç/—Ñ–æ—Ä–º—É, –ø–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ç—å –≤ –¥—Ä—É–≥—É—é —Å–µ—Å—Å–∏—é) * ‚õ∂ –û–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–∏—Ç—å –∑–æ–Ω—ã –Ω–∞–≤–∏–≥–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –¥–ª—è —É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤ * ‚öá –û–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–∏—Ç—å –æ–ø–æ–≤–µ—â–µ–Ω–∏—è –æ —Å–±–ª–∏–∂–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –¥–ª—è –ø–∞—Ä —É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤ * üñß –ü–æ–¥–µ–ª–∏—Ç—å—Å—è —Å–µ–∞–Ω—Å–æ–º —Å –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏–º–∏ –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è–º–∏ Nextcloud –∏–ª–∏ —Å –ø—É–±–ª–∏—á–Ω–æ–π —Å—Å—ã–ª–∫–æ–π (–≤ —Ä–µ–∂–∏–º–µ —á—Ç–µ–Ω–∏—è) * üîó –ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –ø—É–±–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã–µ —Å—Å—ã–ª–∫–∏ —Å –Ω–µ–æ–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–º–∏ –æ–≥—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—á–µ–Ω–∏—è–º–∏ (—Ñ–∏–ª—å—Ç—Ä—ã, –∏–º—è —É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∞, —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ–¥–Ω–∏–µ –ø–æ–∑–∏—Ü–∏–∏, –æ–≥—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –∑–æ–Ω—ã –Ω–∞–≤–∏–≥–∞—Ü–∏–∏) * üñ´ –ò–º–ø–æ—Ä—Ç/—ç–∫—Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç —Å–µ—Å—Å–∏–∏ –≤ —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç–µ GPX (–æ–¥–∏–Ω —Ñ–∞–π–ª —Å –æ–¥–Ω–∏–º —Ç—Ä–µ–∫–æ–º –Ω–∞ —É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤–æ –∏–ª–∏ –æ–¥–∏–Ω —Ñ–∞–π–ª –Ω–∞ —É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤–æ) * üó† –û—Ç–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–∞—Ç—å —Å—Ç–∞—Ç–∏—Å—Ç–∏–∫—É —Å–µ—Å—Å–∏–π * üîí [–ó–∞–ø–æ–º–Ω–∏—Ç—å –∏–º—è —É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∞](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#device-name-reservation) —á—Ç–æ–±—ã —É–±–µ–¥–∏—Ç—å—Å—è, —á—Ç–æ —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –∞–≤—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç –≤–æ–π—Ç–∏ —Å —Ç–∞–∫–∏–º –∏–º–µ–Ω–µ–º * üóì –ü–µ—Ä–µ–∫–ª—é—á–∏—Ç—å –∞–≤—Ç–æ—ç–∫—Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç –∏ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–æ—á–∏—Å—Ç–∫—É —Å–µ—Å—Å–∏–∏ (–µ–∂–µ–¥–Ω–µ–≤–Ω–æ/–µ–∂–µ–Ω–µ–¥–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ/–µ–∂–µ–º–µ—Å—è—á–Ω–æ) * ‚óî –í—ã–±—Ä–∞—Ç—å, —á—Ç–æ –¥–µ–ª–∞—Ç—å, –∫–æ–≥–¥–∞ —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω –ª–∏–º–∏—Ç –∫–æ–ª–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞ —Ç–æ—á–µ–∫ (–±–ª–æ–∫–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∫–∞ –∑–∞–ø–∏—Å–∏ –∏–ª–∏ —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å–∞–º–æ–π —Å—Ç–∞—Ä–æ–π —Ç–æ—á–∫–∏)

üåç Pom√¥≈æte n√°m preklada≈• t√∫to aplik√°ciu na [PhoneTrack Crowdin project](https://crowdin.com/project/phonetrack).

Vyberte si preferovan√∫ [met√≥du z√°znamu](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#logging-methods). * Pozerajte si polohu zariaden√≠ v rel√°cii v re√°lnom ƒçase (alebo aj nie) v PhoneTracku a zdieƒæajte ich na verejn√Ωch str√°nkach.
(\*) Nezabudnite nastavi≈• n√°zov zariadenia v odkaze (rad≈°ej ako v nastaveniach logovacej aplik√°cie). Nahraƒète "yourname" zvolen√Ωm n√°zvom zariadenia. Nastavenie n√°zvu zariadenia v nastaveniach logovacej aplik√°cie funguje len s Owntracks, Traccar a OpenGTS.
Na hlavnej str√°nke PhoneTrack m√¥≈æe≈° poƒças sledovania sedenia:
* üìç Zobrazi≈• hist√≥riu polohy * ‚õõ Filtrova≈• body * ‚úé Manu√°lne upravova≈•/prid√°va≈•/maza≈• body * ‚úé Upravova≈• zariadenia (premenova≈•, zmeni≈• farbu/tvar, pres√∫va≈• do in√©ho sedenia) * ‚õ∂ Definova≈• geofence z√≥ny pre zariadenia * ‚öá Zad√°va≈• v√Ωstrahy vzdialenia pre p√°ry zariaden√≠ * üñß Zdieƒæa≈• sedenie s ƒèal≈°√≠mi Nextcloud pou≈æ√≠vateƒæmi alebo pomocou verejn√Ωch odkazov (len na ƒç√≠tanie) * üîó Generujte odkazy verejn√©ho zdieƒæania s voliteƒæn√Ωmi obmedzeniami (filtre, n√°zov zariadenia, len posledn√° poz√≠cia, zjednodu≈°en√Ω geofence) * üñ´ Importujte/exportujte z√°znamy v GPX form√°te (jeden s√∫bor s jedn√Ωm z√°znamom alebo jeden s√∫bor s jedn√Ωm zariaden√≠m) * üó† Zobrazi≈• ≈°tatistiky z√°znamu * üîí [Rezervova≈• n√°zov zariadenia](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#device-name-reservation) pre uistenie sa, ≈æe len autorizovan√Ω pou≈æ√≠vateƒæ sa m√¥≈æe prihl√°si≈• s t√Ωmto menom * üóì Zap√≠na≈• automatick√© exportovanie z√°znamu a automatick√© mazanie (denne/t√Ω≈ædenne/mesaƒçne) * ‚óî Vybera≈•, ƒço sa stane, keƒè je dosiahnut√Ω limit poƒçtu bodov (zablokova≈• z√°znam alebo vymaza≈• najstar≈°√≠ bod)
Verejn√° str√°nka a verejn√° filtrovan√° str√°nka funguje ako hlavn√° str√°nka okrem situ√°cie, keƒè je zobrazen√Ω len jeden z√°znam, v≈°etko je len na ƒç√≠tanie a nie je potrebn√© prihlasova≈• sa.

info.description:
# PhoneTrack Nextcloud application
üì± PhoneTrack is a Nextcloud application to track and store mobile devices locations.
üó∫ It receives information from mobile phones logging apps and displays it dynamically on a map.
üåç Help us to translate this app on [PhoneTrack Crowdin project](https://crowdin.com/project/phonetrack).
‚öí Check out other ways to help in the [contribution guidelines](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
How to use PhoneTrack :
* Create a tracking session. * Give the logging link\* to the mobile devices. Choose the [logging method](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#logging-methods) you prefer. * Watch the session's devices location in real time (or not) in PhoneTrack or share it with public pages.
(\*) Don't forget to set the device name in the link (rather than in the logging app settings). Replace "yourname" with the desired device name. Setting the device name in logging app settings only works with Owntracks, Traccar and OpenGTS.
On PhoneTrack main page, while watching a session, you can :
* üìç Display location history * ‚õõ Filter points * ‚úé Manually edit/add/delete points * ‚úé Edit devices (rename, change color/shape, move to another session) * ‚õ∂ Define geofencing zones for devices * ‚öá Define proximity alerts for device pairs * üñß Share a session to other Nextcloud users or with a public link (read-only) * üîó Generate public share links with optional restrictions (filters, device name, last positions only, geofencing simplification) * üñ´ Import/export a session in GPX format (one file with one track per device or one file per device) * üó† Display sessions statistics * üîí [Reserve a device name](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#device-name-reservation) to make sure only authorized user can log with this name * üóì Toggle session auto export and auto purge (daily/weekly/monthly) * ‚óî Choose what to do when point number quota is reached (block logging or delete oldest point)
Public page and public filtered page work like main page except there is only one session displayed, everything is read-only and there is no need to be logged in.
This app is tested on Nextcloud 17 with Firefox 57+ and Chromium.
This app is compatible with theming colors and accessibility themes !
This app is under development.
## Namesti
See the [AdminDoc](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/admindoc) for installation details.
Check [CHANGELOG](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#change-log) file to see what's new and what's coming in next release.
Check [AUTHORS](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/AUTHORS.md#authors) file to see complete list of authors.
## Known issues
* PhoneTrack **now works** with Nextcloud group restriction activated. See [admindoc](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/admindoc#issue-with-phonetrack-restricted-to-some-groups-in-nextcloud).
Any feedback will be appreciated.
## Donation
I develop this app during my free time.
* [Donate with Paypal](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=66PALMY8SF5JE) (you don't need a paypal account) * [Donate with Liberapay : ![Donate using Liberapay](https://liberapay.com/assets/widgets/donate.svg)](https://liberapay.com/eneiluj/donate)

Ai merr informacion nga aplikacionet e regjistrimit t√´ celular√´ve dhe i shfaq ato n√´ m√´nyr√´ dinamike n√´ hart√´.
Na ndihmoni ta p√´rkthejm√´ k√´t√´ aplikacion te [Projekti PhoneTrack Crowding](https://crowdin.com/project/phonetrack).
Shikoni m√´nyra t√´ tjera p√´r t√´ ndihmuar te [udh√´zimet p√´r ndihm√´](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
Si t√´ p√´rdorni PhoneTrack:
* Krijoni nj√´ seanc√´ gjurmimi. * Vendosni lidhjen e regjistrimit \ * te pajisjet e l√´vizsh√´me. Zgjidhni [ metod√´n e regjistrimit ](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#logging-methods) q√´ preferoni. * Shikoni vendndodhjen e pajisjeve t√´ seancave n√´ koh√´ reale (ose jo) n√´ PhoneTrack ose ndani at√´ me faqet publike.
(\*) Don't forget to set the device name in the link (rather than in the logging app settings). Replace "yourname" with the desired device name. Setting the device name in logging app settings only works with Owntracks, Traccar and OpenGTS.
On PhoneTrack main page, while watching a session, you can :
* üìç Display location history * ‚õõ Filter points * ‚úé Manually edit/add/delete points * ‚úé Edit devices (rename, change color/shape, move to another session) * ‚õ∂ Define geofencing zones for devices * ‚öá Define proximity alerts for device pairs * üñß Share a session to other Nextcloud users or with a public link (read-only) * üîó Generate public share links with optional restrictions (filters, device name, last positions only, geofencing simplification) * üñ´ Import/export a session in GPX format (one file with one track per device or one file per device) * üó† Display sessions statistics * üîí [Reserve a device name](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#device-name-reservation) to make sure only authorized user can log with this name * üóì Toggle session auto export and auto purge (daily/weekly/monthly) * ‚óî Choose what to do when point number quota is reached (block logging or delete oldest point)
Public page and public filtered page work like main page except there is only one session displayed, everything is read-only and there is no need to be logged in.
This app is tested on Nextcloud 17 with Firefox 57+ and Chromium.
This app is compatible with theming colors and accessibility themes !
This app is under development.
## Install
See the [AdminDoc](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/admindoc) for installation details.
Check [CHANGELOG](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#change-log) file to see what's new and what's coming in next release.
Check [AUTHORS](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/AUTHORS.md#authors) file to see complete list of authors.

* PhoneTrack **now works** with Nextcloud group restriction activated. See [admindoc](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/admindoc#issue-with-phonetrack-restricted-to-some-groups-in-nextcloud).

* –°—Ç–≤–æ—Ä—ñ—Ç—å —Å–µ—Å—ñ—é —Ç—Ä–µ–∫—ñ–Ω–≥—É. * –ù–∞–¥–∞–π—Ç–µ –ø–æ—Å–∏–ª–∞–Ω–Ω—è\* –¥–ª—è –∑–±–µ—Ä–µ–∂–µ–Ω–Ω—è —ñ—Å—Ç–æ—Ä—ñ—ó –≥–µ–æ–ª–æ–∫–∞—Ü—ñ—ó –Ω–∞ –º–æ–±—ñ–ª—å–Ω–∏–π –ø—Ä–∏—Å—Ç—Ä—ñ–π. –û–±–µ—Ä—ñ—Ç—å [–º–µ—Ç–æ–¥ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–¥–∞—á—ñ —ñ–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü—ñ—ó –ø—Ä–æ –≥–µ–æ–ª–æ–∫–∞—Ü—ñ—é](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#logging-methods), —è–∫–∏–π –≤–∞–º –ø—ñ–¥—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç—å. * –ü–µ—Ä–µ–≥–ª—è–¥–∞–π—Ç–µ –º—ñ—Å—Ü–µ —Ä–æ–∑—Ç–∞—à—É–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—è –ø—Ä–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–æ—ó–≤ —É —Ä–µ–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–º—É —á–∞—Å—ñ (–∞–±–æ –Ω—ñ) —É PhoneTrack –∞–±–æ –¥—ñ–ª—ñ—Ç—å—Å—è –Ω–µ—é –Ω–∞ –∑–∞–≥–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω–∏—Ö —Å—Ç–æ—Ä—ñ–Ω–∫–∞—Ö.

–ù–∞ –≥–æ–ª–æ–≤–Ω—ñ–π —Å—Ç–æ—Ä—ñ–Ω—Ü—ñ PhoneTrack –ø—ñ–¥ —á–∞—Å –ø–µ—Ä–µ–≥–ª—è–¥—É —Å–µ—Å—ñ—ó –≤–∏ –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç–µ:
* üìç –ü–µ—Ä–µ–≥–ª—è–¥–∞—Ç–∏ —ñ—Å—Ç–æ—Ä—ñ—é –º—ñ—Å—Ü–µ–∑–Ω–∞—Ö–æ–¥–∂–µ–Ω—å * ‚õõ –§—ñ–ª—å—Ç—Ä—É–≤–∞—Ç–∏ —Ç–æ—á–∫–∏ * ‚úé –í—Ä—É—á–Ω—É —Ä–µ–¥–∞–≥—É–≤–∞—Ç–∏/–¥–æ–¥–∞–≤–∞—Ç–∏/–≤–∏–¥–∞–ª—è—Ç–∏ —Ç–æ—á–∫–∏ * ‚úé –†–µ–¥–∞–≥—É–≤–∞—Ç–∏ –ø—Ä–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–æ—ó (–ø–µ—Ä–µ–π–º–µ–Ω—É–≤–∞—Ç–∏, –∑–º—ñ–Ω–∏—Ç–∏ –∫–æ–ª—ñ—Ä/—Ñ–æ—Ä–º—É, –ø–µ—Ä–µ–º—ñ—Å—Ç–∏—Ç–∏ –≤ —ñ–Ω—à—É —Å–µ—Å—ñ—é) * ‚õ∂ –í–∏–∑–Ω–∞—á–∏—Ç–∏ –∑–æ–Ω–∏ –≤—ñ—Ä—Ç—É–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ –ø–∞—Ä–∫–∞–Ω—É (geofencing) –¥–ª—è –ø—Ä–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–æ—ó–≤ * ‚öá –í–∏–∑–Ω–∞—á–∞—Ç–∏ —Å–ø–æ–≤—ñ—â–µ–Ω–Ω—è –ø—Ä–æ –Ω–∞–±–ª–∏–∂–µ–Ω–Ω—è –¥–ª—è –ø–∞—Ä –ø—Ä–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–æ—ó–≤ * üñß –ù–∞–¥–∞—Ç–∏ –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø –¥–æ —Å–µ—Å—ñ—ó –¥–ª—è —ñ–Ω—à–∏—Ö –∫–æ—Ä–∏—Å—Ç—É–≤–∞—á—ñ–≤ Nextcloud –∞–±–æ –¥–ª—è –ø—É–±–ª—ñ—á–Ω–æ–≥–æ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–≥–ª—è–¥—É (–ª–∏—à–µ –¥–ª—è —á–∏—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω—è) * üîó –°—Ç–≤–æ—Ä—é–≤–∞—Ç–∏ –ø–æ—Å–∏–ª–∞–Ω–Ω—è –¥–ª—è –ø—É–±–ª—ñ—á–Ω–æ–≥–æ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–≥–ª—è–¥—É –∑ –æ–±–º–µ–∂–µ–Ω–Ω—è–º–∏ (—Ñ—ñ–ª—å—Ç—Ä–∏, –Ω–∞–∑–≤–∞ –ø—Ä–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–æ—é, –ª–∏—à–µ –æ—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω—ñ –ø–æ–∑–∏—Ü—ñ—ó, —Å–ø—Ä–æ—â–µ–Ω—ñ –≥–µ–æ–ø–∞—Ä–∫–∞–Ω–∏) * üñ´ –Ü–º–ø–æ—Ä—Ç—É–≤–∞—Ç–∏/–µ–∫—Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç—É–≤–∞—Ç–∏ —Å–µ—Å—ñ—ó —É —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç—ñ GPX (–ø–æ—Ç—Ä–µ–∫–æ–≤–æ –¥–ª—è –ø—Ä–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–æ—é —á–∏ –æ–¥–Ω–∏–º —Ñ–∞–π–ª–∞–º) * üó† –ü–µ—Ä–µ–≥–ª—è–¥–∞—Ç–∏ —Å—Ç–∞—Ç–∏—Å—Ç–∏–∫—É —Å–µ—Å—ñ—ó * üîí [–ó–∞—Ä–µ–∑–µ—Ä–≤—É–≤–∞—Ç–∏ —ñ–º'—è –ø—Ä–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–æ—é](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#device-name-reservation), —â–æ–± –ø–µ—Ä–µ–∫–æ–Ω–∞—Ç–∏—Å—è, —â–æ —Ç—ñ–ª—å–∫–∏ –∞–≤—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–π –∫–æ—Ä–∏—Å—Ç—É–≤–∞—á –º–æ–∂–µ –≤–∏–∫–æ—Ä–∏—Å—Ç–æ–≤—É–≤–∞—Ç–∏ —Ü–µ —ñ–º'—è * üóì –ù–∞–ª–∞—à—Ç—É–≤–∞—Ç–∏ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–Ω–∏–π –µ–∫—Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç —Ç–∞ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–æ—á–∏—â–µ–Ω–Ω—è (—â–æ–¥–Ω—è/—â–æ—Ç–∏–∂–Ω–µ–≤–æ/—â–æ–º—ñ—Å—è—á–Ω–æ) * ‚óî –û–±–∏—Ä–∞—Ç–∏, —â–æ —Ä–æ–±–∏—Ç–∏ –ø—Ä–∏ –¥–æ—Å—è–≥–Ω–µ–Ω–Ω—ñ –∫–≤–æ—Ç–∏ —Ç–æ—á–æ–∫ (–±–ª–æ–∫—É–≤–∞—Ç–∏ –ø–æ–¥–∞–ª—å—à–µ –∑–±–∏—Ä–∞–Ω–Ω—è —á–∏ –≤–∏–¥–∞–ª—è—Ç–∏ –Ω–∞–π—Å—Ç–∞—Ä—ñ—à—ñ —Ç–æ—á–∫–∏)
–ü—É–±–ª—ñ—á–Ω–∞ —Å—Ç–æ—Ä—ñ–Ω–∫–∞ —Ç–∞ –ø—É–±–ª—ñ—á–Ω–∞ —Å—Ç–æ—Ä—ñ–Ω–∫–∞ –∑ —Ñ—ñ–ª—å—Ç—Ä–∞–º–∏ –ø—Ä–∞—Ü—é—é—Ç—å —è–∫ –≥–æ–ª–æ–≤–Ω–∞ —Å—Ç–æ—Ä—ñ–Ω–∫–∞, –∑–∞ –≤–∏–Ω—è—Ç–∫–æ–º —Ç–æ–≥–æ, —â–æ –≤—ñ–¥–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–∞—î—Ç—å—Å—è –ª–∏—à–µ –æ–¥–Ω–∞ —Å–µ—Å—ñ—è, –≤—Å–µ –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω–µ –ª–∏—à–µ –¥–ª—è —á–∏—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω—è, —ñ –Ω–µ–º–∞—î –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö—ñ–¥–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—ñ –∞–≤—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–∑—É–≤–∞—Ç–∏—Å—è.
–¶–µ–π –¥–æ–¥–∞—Ç–æ–∫ –ø—Ä–æ—Ç–µ—Å—Ç–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–π –Ω–∞ Nextcloud 17 –∑ Firefox 57+ —Ç–∞ Chromium.
–¶–µ–π –¥–æ–¥–∞—Ç–æ–∫ —Å—É–º—ñ—Å–Ω–∏–π –∑ –∫–æ–ª—å–æ—Ä–∞–º–∏ —Ç–µ–º —ñ —Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏ –¥–ª—è –ª—é–¥–µ–π –∑ –æ—Å–æ–±–ª–∏–≤–∏–º–∏ –ø–æ—Ç—Ä–µ–±–∞–º–∏!

info.summary: Track and display phones positions in real time
info.description:
# PhoneTrack Nextcloud application
üì± PhoneTrack is a Nextcloud application to track and store mobile devices locations.
üó∫ It receives information from mobile phones logging apps and displays it dynamically on a map.
üåç Help us to translate this app on [PhoneTrack Crowdin project](https://crowdin.com/project/phonetrack).
‚öí Check out other ways to help in the [contribution guidelines](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
How to use PhoneTrack :
* Create a tracking session. * Give the logging link\* to the mobile devices. Choose the [logging method](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#logging-methods) you prefer. * Watch the session's devices location in real time (or not) in PhoneTrack or share it with public pages.
(\*) Don't forget to set the device name in the link (rather than in the logging app settings). Replace "yourname" with the desired device name. Setting the device name in logging app settings only works with Owntracks, Traccar and OpenGTS.
On PhoneTrack main page, while watching a session, you can :
* üìç Display location history * ‚õõ Filter points * ‚úé Manually edit/add/delete points * ‚úé Edit devices (rename, change color/shape, move to another session) * ‚õ∂ Define geofencing zones for devices * ‚öá Define proximity alerts for device pairs * üñß Share a session to other Nextcloud users or with a public link (read-only) * üîó Generate public share links with optional restrictions (filters, device name, last positions only, geofencing simplification) * üñ´ Import/export a session in GPX format (one file with one track per device or one file per device) * üó† Display sessions statistics * üîí [Reserve a device name](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/userdoc#device-name-reservation) to make sure only authorized user can log with this name * üóì Toggle session auto export and auto purge (daily/weekly/monthly) * ‚óî Choose what to do when point number quota is reached (block logging or delete oldest point)
Public page and public filtered page work like main page except there is only one session displayed, everything is read-only and there is no need to be logged in.
This app is tested on Nextcloud 17 with Firefox 57+ and Chromium.
This app is compatible with theming colors and accessibility themes !
This app is under development.
## Install
See the [AdminDoc](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/admindoc) for installation details.
Check [CHANGELOG](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#change-log) file to see what's new and what's coming in next release.
Check [AUTHORS](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/blob/master/AUTHORS.md#authors) file to see complete list of authors.
## Known issues
* PhoneTrack **now works** with Nextcloud group restriction activated. See [admindoc](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-oc/wikis/admindoc#issue-with-phonetrack-restricted-to-some-groups-in-nextcloud).
Any feedback will be appreciated.
## Donation
I develop this app during my free time.
* [Donate with Paypal](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=66PALMY8SF5JE) (you don't need a paypal account) * [Donate with Liberapay : ![Donate using Liberapay](https://liberapay.com/assets/widgets/donate.svg)](https://liberapay.com/eneiluj/donate)

üì± ÊâãÊ©üËøΩËπ§ÊòØ‰∏ÄÊ¨æNextcloudÊáâÁî®Á®ãÂºèÔºåÁî®‰æÜË®òÈåÑÂÑ≤Â≠òÁßªÂãïË£ùÁΩÆÁöÑ‰ΩçÁΩÆ„ÄÇ
üó∫ Êé•Êî∂ÂæûÊâãÊ©ü‰ΩçÁΩÆË®òÈåÑÂÇ≥ÈÄÅ‰æÜÁöÑË≥áË®äÔºåÂú®Âú∞Âúñ‰∏äÈ°ØÁ§∫„ÄÇ
üåç Ë´ãÂà©Áî®[PhoneTrack Crowdin Ë®àÁï´](https://crowdin.com/project/phonetrack)Âπ´Âä©ÁøªË≠Ø
